channel.title: Bl0ckcreations [survival, pvp]
channel.description: Bl0ckcreations server i made this server for some people looking for a survival server with not a lot of people on it rules- [1] No swearing [2] No griefing [3] No stealing [4] No advertising [5] No region hopping [6] If someone built a house unclaimed DONT CLAIM IT! [7] No locking unlocked chests [8] No spamming chat features- [1] claim land [2] locking chests [3] add books to the local library [4] ability to set your home [5] and more! [6] jailing rule breakers! [7] mob arena [8] PVP arena coming soon! servers ip- play.bl0ckcreations.com:25574 server ranks- idk what these are but i dont think we have any owner- ltaa09 comeatmee plugins- announcer bookrules buycraft essentials jail LWC logblock maintenance mode mobarena permissons ex residence votifier worldedit worldguard ichat

item.title: Bl0ckcreations [survival, pvp]
item.dc:creator: @bl0ckcreations bl0ckcreations
item.description:
@bl0ckcreations wrote:

Bl0ckcreations server i made this server for some people looking for a survival server with not a lot of people on it
rules-
[1] No swearing
[2] No griefing
[3] No stealing
[4] No advertising
[5] No region hopping
[6] If someone built a house unclaimed DONT CLAIM IT!
[7] No locking unlocked chests
[8] No spamming chat
features-
[1] claim land
[2] locking chests
[3] add books to the local library
[4] ability to set your home
[5] and more!
[6] jailing rule breakers!
[7] mob arena
[8] PVP arena coming soon!
servers ip-
play.bl0ckcreations.com:25574
server ranks-
idk what these are but i dont think we have any
